content: teeny turtle crochet pattern hannah ratliff on ravelry 1 materials needed worsted weight yarn in two colors for turtle one for tummy and shell 3 75mm hook embroidery thread for eyes optional 5mm safety eyes optional scissors stuffing fiber fill embroidery needle stitches and abbreviations u s terminology single single_crochet chain chain slip_stitch slp-st increase increase decrease decrease magic_ring back/front loop only blo/flo # the number of stitches you should have after each round stitch st pattern notes if you have any questions while working the pattern please message me on ravelry i will get back to you soon you may sell the items made from this pattern but please do not sell distribute trade or share the pattern itself start all chain-st row in the second chain from hook do not join each round with a slip-stitch unless instructed work in continous rounds 2 turtle head work in green round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 increase 6 around 12 round 3 single_crochet 12 around 12 round 4 *single_crochet decrease* x4 around 8 at this point install safety eyes optional between rounds 3 and 4 about 3 stitches apart on either side of the head see fourth photo below depending on your yarn type the head may be too small for eyes embroidering eyes on later is an alternative option however round 5 single_crochet 8 around 8 stuff head slp-st chain 1 to crochet the opening sides together pinch the opening sides together then insert your hook into the next stitch and the on across from it then make a single_crochet in this way make two more single_crochet across see first three photos below fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing 3 turtle shell work in pink round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 increase 6 around 12 round 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 around 18 round 4 single_crochet 5 increase 3 single_crochet 6 increase 3 single_crochet 24 round 5 single_crochet 24 around 24 place your stitch marker into the 19th stitch of the round you just completed it will be used for later reference in crocheting the shell and tummy together see photo above slp-st fasten_off and weave in the end turtle tummy work in green round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 increase 6 around 12 round 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 around 18 round 4 single_crochet 5 increase 3 single_crochet 6 increase 3 single_crochet 24 round 5 single_crochet 5 to make the first flipper chain 7 make 6 half_double_crochet in all in the fourth chain from hook slp-st in ending chain see first photo on next page continue on next page 4 turtle tummy continued work in green continue around the tummy with increase 3 repeat the earlier instructions to make the second flipper continue around the tummy with single_crochet 6 repeat the earlier instructions to make the third flipper continue around the tummy with increase 3 repeat the earlier instructions to make the fourth flipper see third photo below continue around the tummy with single_crochet
